script.name: !lib.player.saferoute
script.sourceplaintext:
* check for current destination if is datatype[ $a.destination ] == DATATYPE_SECTOR do if $a.destination == [SECTOR] return [TRUE] else if is datatype[ $a.destination ] == DATATYPE_ARRAY $sector = $a.destination[3] do if $sector == [SECTOR] return [TRUE] else $dest.sector = $a.destination -> get sector do if $dest.sector == [SECTOR] return [TRUE] end
$bl.lastroute = [THIS] -> get local variable: name='bl.lastroute' if $bl.lastroute $last.dest = $bl.lastroute[0] if $last.dest == $a.destination $playing.time = playing time $time = $bl.lastroute[1] if ( $time + 20 ) > $playing.time $chk = $bl.lastroute[3] if $chk == $a.ignoreJump $chk = $bl.lastroute[4] if $chk == $a.alwaysJump $chk = $bl.lastroute[5] if $chk == $a.ignoreFuel $route = $bl.lastroute[2] return $route end end end end end end [THIS] ->set local variable: name='bl.lastroute' value=null
$race.avoid = table alloc $race.block = table alloc
$ignore = [THIS] ->is ignoring player blacklist if not $ignore $wing = [THIS] -> get flight wing if $wing -> exists do if $wing ->is ignoring player blacklist $ignore = [TRUE] end end
if $ignore $exclude.table = table alloc else $wing = [THIS] -> get flight wing if $wing $blacklist.profile = $wing -> get local variable: name='blacklist.profile' else $blacklist.profile = [THIS] -> get local variable: name='blacklist.profile' end
$cmd = [THIS] -> get command if $cmd != COMMAND_NONE $table.cmds = get global variable: name='bl.cmd.link' if $table.cmds if $table.cmds[$cmd] $blacklist.profile = $table.cmds[$cmd] do if $blacklist.profile == 'global.profile' $blacklist.profile = null end end end
if $blacklist.profile $profiles = get global variable: name='egosoft.bl.profiles' do if $profiles $profile.data = $profiles[$blacklist.profile] end
if $profile.data $race.blacklst.type = $profile.data[0] if $race.blacklst.type == [BlacklistType.Disabled] $race.blacklist = null else if $race.blacklst.type == [BlacklistType.Auto] OR $race.blacklst.type == 3 $race.blacklist = table alloc $race.array = get race array $i = size of array $race.array while $i dec $i = $race = $race.array[$i] $bl = get race blacklist: race=$race $race.blacklist[$race] = $bl end else $race.blacklist = $profile.data[1] $race.blacklist = clone table $race.blacklist end $exclude.table = $profile.data[2] $exclude.table = clone table $exclude.table else $exclude.table = get sector blacklist table $race.blacklist = get race blacklist table end
if $race.blacklist $race = get next key: table=$race.blacklist key=null while $race $type = $race.blacklist[$race] if $type == [Blacklist.Avoid] $race.avoid[$race] = [TRUE] else if $type == [Blacklist.Block] $race.block[$race] = [TRUE] end $race = get next key: table=$race.blacklist key=$race end end end
skip if $exclude.table $exclude.table = table alloc
do if is datatype[ $a.additionoal ] == DATATYPE_TABLE $exclude.table = merge tables, $exclude.table, $a.additionoal, null, null, null
$table.whitelist = table alloc
$allow = [THIS] -> get local variable: name='blacklist.allow' if $allow if is datatype[ $allow ] == DATATYPE_TABLE remove key $allow from table $exclude.table $white.sector = get next key: table=$allow key=null while $white.sector $table.whitelist[$white.sector] = [Blacklist.Whitelist] $white.sector = get next key: table=$allow key=$white.sector end else if is datatype[ $allow ] == DATATYPE_SECTOR remove key $allow from table $exclude.table $table.whitelist[$allow] = [Blacklist.Whitelist] else if is datatype[ $allow ] == DATATYPE_ARRAY $table = convert array to table: $allow, increment=[FALSE] remove key $table from table $exclude.table $i = size of array $allow while $i dec $i = $white.sector = $allow[$i] $table.whitelist[$white.sector] = [Blacklist.Whitelist] end end end
if $a.allow if is datatype[ $a.allow ] == DATATYPE_TABLE remove key $a.allow from table $exclude.table $white.sector = get next key: table=$a.allow key=null while $white.sector $table.whitelist[$white.sector] = [Blacklist.Whitelist] $white.sector = get next key: table=$a.allow key=$white.sector end else if is datatype[ $a.allow ] == DATATYPE_SECTOR remove key $a.allow from table $exclude.table $table.whitelist[$a.allow] = [Blacklist.Whitelist] else if is datatype[ $a.allow ] == DATATYPE_ARRAY $table = convert array to table: $a.allow, increment=[FALSE] remove key $table from table $exclude.table $i = size of array $a.allow while $i dec $i = $white.sector = $a.allow[$i] $table.whitelist[$white.sector] = [Blacklist.Whitelist] end end end
if not [THIS] -> get local variable: name='blacklist.allow' [THIS] ->set local variable: name='blacklist.allow' value=$a.allow end
$whitelist = get global variable: name='player.whitelist' if $whitelist remove key $whitelist from table $exclude.table $white.sector = get next key: table=$whitelist key=null while $white.sector $table.whitelist[$white.sector] = [Blacklist.Whitelist] $white.sector = get next key: table=$whitelist key=$white.sector end end
if size of table $table.whitelist $exclude.table = merge tables, $exclude.table, $table.whitelist, null, null, null end
$race.avoid = get keys: table=$race.avoid $race.block = get keys: table=$race.block
@ $route = [THIS] -> call script !lib.ship.plotpath : Destination=$a.destination Ignore Jumping=$a.ignoreJump Exclude Table=$exclude.table Always Jump=$a.alwaysJump Race Avoid Array=$race.avoid Race Block Array=$race.block Ignore Fuel=$a.ignoreFuel Jump Flags=$a.flags
$time = playing time $bl.lastroute = create new array, size=6, elements=$a.destination, $time, $route, $a.ignoreJump, $a.alwaysJump, $a.ignoreFuel, null, null [THIS] ->set local variable: name='bl.lastroute' value=$bl.lastroute
return $route
